CmdLine: pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip && pip --no-cache-dir install pandas-datareader keras scipy==1.2.1 statsmodels sklearn seaborn pyecharts jupyterthemes tqdm numba && jupyter notebook --generate-config && sed -i "s/#c.NotebookApp.ip = 'localhost'/c.NotebookApp.ip = '*'/g" /root/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py && sed -i "s/#c.NotebookApp.allow_remote_access = False/c.NotebookApp.allow_remote_access = True/g" /root/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py && sed -i "s/#c.NotebookApp.allow_root = False/c.NotebookApp.allow_root = True/g" /root/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py && sed -i "s/#c.NotebookApp.open_browser = True/c.NotebookApp.open_browser = False/g" /root/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py && sed -i "s/#c.NotebookApp.port = 8888/c.NotebookApp.port = 8888/g" /root/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py && jupyter contrib nbextension install --user && python --version && pip list && cat /root/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py | grep c.NotebookApp.
Commands.Name: run
